channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA

item.title: 游댮 12:36 Air alert in Sumy region. Follow for further updates.
item.description: 游댮 12:36 Air alert in Sumy region. Follow for further updates. #Sumy_region This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 游 10:00 FREE EVACUATION We ask you to urgently evacuate from the combat zone or dangerous territory of the Kharkiv region. 24-hour FREE hotline for the evacuation of the civilian population - 0800339291
